title: Emerging Currencies Dip as USD Rises on Data, Geopolitical Risks
description: Emerging-market currencies fell against the dollar after the latest US data eased fear of a sharper slowdown in the labor market and the economy.
content: Emerging-market currencies fell against the dollar after the latest US data eased fear of a sharper slowdown in the labor market and the economy.
